name: Armoured Cavalry: Operation Varkiri
description:
is a rogue like action shooting game with a top-down perspective and double joysticks. It can drive powerful walking mecha to fight in the battlefield generated by random calculation.



Background
A strong military Empire provokes war under the control of a crazy dictator. Even if it has strong military strength, it is still besieged by the allies. You and your military colleagues must stand up to overthrow the dictator in order to stop the war with the allies and save the embattled empire.



War
Use the double joystick to control the heavy machine armour, fight in the dangerous battlefield, and blast the enemy to pieces;
Randomly generated battlefields and enemies in rogue like mode, each battle brings you new challenges;
The enemies who master all kinds of high-tech weapons swarmed in. You must use all your skills to break out of the encirclement;
A variety of task types, each level has different play methods;



Growth
3 classes and 9 types of mecha for you to control, each type has unique capabilities;
It can be matched with hundreds of skills and equipment to form a unique tactical combination;
